description: *0.2.10* Enable full screen and navigation for touchpad, added a warning when the database gets full, added the ability to delete a months records,*0.2.9* Bug fix, *0.2.8* Navigation arrows added for Input, Week & Month screens, More support options added, Check out button added next to Start Lunch Button, *0.2.7* A Weekly View has been added, *0.2.6* Bug Fix (Auto Clockin calculating and saving Hours) *0.2.5* Added Calcs button on Input screen to explain how the app is calculating the times, *0.2.4* Bug Fix due to Daylight Savings Time, *0.2.3* Data export to email, Timesheet is an app to record your working day (i.e. clock in time, lunch break and clock out time) and Calculates your hours worked, flexi time for the day and overtime. This app is now configurable to hopefully everyone's working week( may be not everyone ).
